(Yay, I feel negleted.)
Cryotek: 
     He was waiting for Cygnar in the office, when Cygnar came in, Cryotek stood up.
     "Good evening," He said. "My name is Cryotek, I'm going to be blunt," He started walking towards Cygnar, "I want to kill Megatron."
 Rudra656@... wrote:OOC: Oops... I knew I forgot a plot somewhere... 

::Cygnar:: 
      He finally arrives at Galvatron's base.  He unlocks it and walks inside to begin his quest to revive Galvatron.  He gradually makes his way to the command chair and surveys his new charge.  Yes, I could get used to this.
